about_the_game:
Give your Japanese female characters a voice to be heard with Japanese Anime Voices：Female Character Series Vol.1 from Bitter Sweet Entertainment! Bring your anime characters to life with these common vocal phrases spoken in Japanese by professional voice actors.

Features:

* 127 Japanese animation-like female voices (phrases) for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Female voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPGs and much more!
* English translation file included
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engines of your choice!
